reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits beautifully, with one noting it hits just below the knee, and appreciate its versatility as a perfect little black dress that's comfortable for cool climates. The material receives mixed feedback - while some love it and find it feels soft against the skin, others describe it as horrible and too thin. The dress stretches well over bumps, and customers like its style, with one mentioning it works well for casual day wear. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I just love this purple short sleeve dress!
items.body: I love how nicely this short sleeve dress fits, and it's in such a beautiful purple color too. This dress is so stretchy and form fitting on your body, it hugs every inch. The material is soft and very comfortable. It's a very thin and light weight dress, so it's perfect for the summer. It reaches down to your mid thighs, so you'll be showing a good portion of your legs. I love to wear nice silky and shiny pantyhose whenever I wear a dress, and they look great with this one. I feel so feminine and sexy walking around in this absolutely wonderful dress, and a pair of high heels, of course. Read more
items.author: Lenny S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GET THIS DRESS!
items.body: I LOVE THIS DRESS! I actually liked it so much that when the winter came, I ordered it in long sleeve also! It is very form fitting, so if you aren't super comfortable with your body, consider shareware under the dress. The dress is cut to be very flattering. The hips are CUT INTO the dress so it makes your hip/bottom area look amazing (even if you don't have one)! I'm 5'3", 130 lbs and ordered the small. I'm small but curvy and this fit amazingly! At its natural length it fell just below my knees. But bc it is tight fitting, I was able to pull it up to just about the knee without it looking off. The material was thick and soft. Think of a tshirt with flannel inside. Surprisingly the short sleeved dress wasn't hot in the summer and the long sleeve was warm in the winter. The white is NOT see through and the wine color is true to what the color should be. Both dresses have washed and dried without loosing size, shape or color. I 100% recommend this dress for ANYONE!!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Dress to Turn Heads
items.body: This is my third dress purchased from this vendor! I own the orange and lavendar dress. I am reviewing the bright red dress. I love it! I purchased the extra large. My measurements are 40 - 35 - 43. I am five feet eight inches tall. It fits perfectly! The dress hits about an inch below my knee. This is a dress you can wear out on a date with that special fellow or just hanging with the girls. It is absolutely alluring and will turn heads. I have received multiple compliments on my orange and lavendar dress. I can't wait to wear this red one! The dress is made of 10% spandex and 90% polyester. It is not thick material; yet, the darker colors are not see-through. I would still suggest wearing a shaper to hide a few bulges. The dress is sexy without being totally revealing. Enjoy! Read more
items.author: Shvonne

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress
items.body: It is a good dress with a beautiful color. Fits very well, comes clean. Just a little thinner than expected but not see through. I am 5’2, 146lbs and I have a small. A medium could also work. Read more
items.author: Oshaunae Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: I loved the color, the sleeve fit and the thickness and softness of the fabric. It is such a beautiful dress and I noticed in the other review photos it looked fantastic on shapely women. First, I tried it on without a shaper (3rd photo) and it was definitely not flattering. With the shaper it is acceptable, but just too form fitting for me. The other ladies look so fantastic I was hoping it would be the same for me! So sad to have to return it. I I gave the dress five stars because of the quality and how it looks on others. I am 149 lbs and 5'5", size 10 usually. Read more
items.author: PUMPKIN

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Reasonable for price
items.body: Great fit, super comfortable, true to size. Black dye bleeds while you wear it even after washing.. Read more
items.author: Mary S. Porterfield

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these, wish they had more colors!
items.body: The fabric is soft!! These don't wrinkle much and wash well. They fit my body very well and I bought them in 3 colors. I am 5 foot, 130 pounds, 38 x 30 x 40 inches. I bought size small. They are tight and hug my body, but that's how I want them to fit. Read more
items.author: ElizGarza

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: I love this dress! The material is very comfortable and flattering. It's thin but the black isn't see through. I'm 5'9", 8 months pregnant, and about 170 lbs and the large fits great. If I pull it down it lands right below my knees but it naturally sits right above my knees. Read more
items.author: Ryan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Long Sleeve White, Z Short Sleeve Black, Z Short Sleeve Red, Long Sleeve Royal Blue, Z Short Sleeve White, Long Sleeve Black, Long Sleeve Winered, Z Short Sleeve Orange, Z Short Sleeve Yellow, Long Sleeve Coffee, Long Sleeve Dark Green, Z Short Sleeve Water Pink, Z Short Sleeve Purple, Z Short Sleeve Dark Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
